description.raw:
This PR introduces some very basic features for adding mesh shapes to a simulation. It also implements the features in the dartsim plugin. The new feature depends on `ignition-common-graphics` \(specifically `ignition::common::Mesh`\), so it's been put into its own optional component: `ignition-physics-mesh`, similar to how the `ignition-physics-sdf` features are in an optional component that depends on `sdformat`.

I’ve added a _very_ rudimentary test for the dartsim implementation of this feature. If there’s an imminent need for more comprehensive tests for mesh shapes, let me know and I can put more time towards that.

title: Adding support for MeshShape
